metadata.title: CVE-2020-17534 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There exists a race condition between the deletion of the temporary fileand the creation of the temporary directory in `webkit` subproject ofHTML/Java API version 1.7. A similar vulnerability has recently beendisclosed in other Java projects and the fix in HTML/Java API version 1.7.1follows theirs: To avoid local privilege escalation version 1.7.1 createsthe temporary directory atomically without dealing with the temporary file:https://github.com/apache/netbeans-html4j/commit/fa70e507e5555e1adb4f6518479fc408a7abd0e6

criterions.comment: netbeans: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
